definition: romance/beautiful scenery/small or petty (of talk etc)

sentences.english: The unrelated temptress, a yearning heart in hometown, hometown.
sentences.chinese: 此時無關風月，只道秋思故鄉，心繫在故里。

sentences.english: His individual photo selection of landscape has been published.
sentences.chinese: 出版有個人攝影專輯《風月》。

sentences.english: Say a sentence to disappoint you of words, maybe he was a romantic veteran.
sentences.chinese: 說句讓你掃興的話，沒準他是個風月老手。

definition: abbr. for Shijing 詩經|诗经[Shi1 jing1], the Book of Songs
wind and rain/the elements/trials and hardships
Wanli township in New Taipei City 新北市[Xin1 bei3 shi4], Taiwan
the world of mortals (Buddhism)/human society/worldly affairs
to take up one's pen/to start to write
to inscribe a poem (often, composed on the spot) on a painting, fan or ceramic bowl etc as a work of calligraphy/an inscribed poem
poetic essay/taxation/to bestow on/to endow with
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
